page.title: 07DEFYNNOG C.P. SCHOOL'S TRIP
page.content: On Friday we had our school visit. We went to Tredegar House by Newport somewhere. The blacksmith in Defynnog had just finished repairing some gates there, the papers said they had cost Â£53,000. We saw them in the day. They looked really fantastic. Anyway back to the trip. We went by coach and by the time we had got to the end of the drive Sarah was eating..at three miles she was being sick, luckily no one was in the way. After that not much happened really. The boys had to be told to sit down every few minutes and the girls to stop singing. It rained anyway. Sarah kept eating... and being sick. When we got to the place most of us played tag then we went to the shops and bought ice creams and rock and things. Then we went to the loos and started for home. Oh yes the house was good too!! (A Class effort)
